data.name: How to use social media to promote your website and products
data.summary:
Topics Covered:
1. How to build hype around your new products using social media
2. What social media channels work best for your new business?
3. How to sell on social media without a website?
4. Mistakes all businesses should avoid on the internet.
data.speakers: Shreya Sharan Pawar, Online Marketing Expert & Business coach
